attributes.action: Call for Ministers of Parliament who have abused their expenses to have their accounts turned over to the police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The telegraph and several other newspapers have shown us the sheer number of MP's wasting public money for their selfish personal interests. MP's who abuse the system are just as bad as the benefit thieves which we aggressively go after and jail. So why don't we launched criminal investigations into MP's? We want the government to turn over all accounts of those who have been suspected of abusing the system. So the police can take appropriate action.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
